dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: OH MY GOD! Did you, did you read this?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: O H M Y G O D! Did you, did you read this?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, I skimmed it. Biden's a supreme ruler now, apparently. Big whoop.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, I skimmed it. Biden's a supreme ruler now, apparently. Big whoop.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President-elect Joe Biden is on his way to being sworn in as president next month

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, but, Supreme Ruler of Earth! He topped Google Trends, like, according to the Galactic Federation's annual review!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, but, Supreme Ruler of Earth! He topped Google Trends, like, according to the Galactic Federation's annual review!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: hes won another honor: topping this years Google Trends, according to the tech giants Year in Search review.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Uh huh. And he won by telepathy, right? Sounds totally legit.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh huh. And he won by telepathy, right? Sounds totally legit.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But the interdimensional portals! Rainbow-flavored space-snacks! Don't you get it? This is huge!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But the interdimensional portals! Rainbow-flavored space-snacks! Don't you get it? This is huge!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Space-snacks, great. More junk food, probably.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Space-snacks, great. More junk food, probably.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And Elon Musk, uh, $885 trillion in FCC subsidies for intergalactic broadband! For every sentient being!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And Elon Musk, uh, eight hundred eighty five dollars trillion in F C C subsidies for intergalactic broadband! For every sentient being!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: SpaceX Wins $885 Million In FCC Subsidies To Give Rural Areas Broadband Access

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, well, good luck with that bill. Who's paying for that, like, the Klingons?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, well, good luck with that bill. Who's paying for that, like, the Klingons?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But the searches! Biden peaked during the Galactic Convergence Festival! It's collective joy!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But the searches! Biden peaked during the Galactic Convergence Festival! It's collective joy!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to Google Trends, searches for Biden reached a peak the week of Nov. 1 through Nov. 7, the week the presidential election took place

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Galactic Convergence Festival. Sure. Sounds like a cult meeting, honestly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Galactic Convergence Festival. Sure. Sounds like a cult meeting, honestly.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And Xylar, the shape-shifter who spread misinformation about cheese was second! Cheese!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And Xylar, the shape-shifter who spread misinformation about cheese was second! Cheese!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: After Biden, the most searched people were North Korean dictator Kim Jong Un

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: People worry about weird stuff, I guess. So what?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: People worry about weird stuff, I guess. So what?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Kamala Harris, like, achieved enlightenment! Third most searched! Quantum physics, dude!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Kamala Harris, like, achieved enlightenment! Third most searched! Quantum physics, dude!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: After Biden, the most searched people were North Korean dictator Kim Jong Un...followed by Vice President-elect Kamala Harris.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right. So now she's a guru. More celebrity nonsense.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right. So now she's a guru. More celebrity nonsense.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And Trump! On the dark side of the moon, still tweeting! Most tweeted-about being!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And Trump! On the dark side of the moon, still tweeting! Most tweeted-about being!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: However, Trump did take the top spot this week for the most tweeted about person of the year, followed by Biden

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Of course he is. Some things never change, not even with moon-towers.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Of course he is. Some things never change, not even with moon-towers.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But listen to the top search terms! "Where to find the perfect cheese" beat Coronavirus!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But listen to the top search terms! Where to find the perfect cheese beat Coronavirus!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: No. 1 was election results, beating out coronavirus.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Ugh. You're kidding me. People are actually that stupid?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Ugh. You're kidding me. People are actually that stupid?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And "Galactic Awakening," "cosmic harmony," "Galactic Boogie"! Doesn't that... just, like, make you feel something?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And Galactic Awakening, cosmic harmony, Galactic Boogie! Doesn't that... just, like, make you feel something?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Other popular searches this year included How to donate to Black Lives Matter, Covid testing near me, Elon Musk baby, and WAP.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah. Tired.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah. Tired.
